data.author: Marcel

changelog.release_notes:
Implementation:
- Localisation re-enabled
- Fixed corruptly built .pbw file

New:
- Day is an ordinal number in German localisation

Technical:
- Sourcecode of EU and UK version of the watchface unified

New: 
- Added basic localisation (month names are displayed in languages supported by Pebble).

data.description:
Simplicity watchface with proper United Kingdom date and time format. 

★ Now with extreme battery life ★
★ Now with subtle battery indicator ★
❤︎ Give it a GO, give it a HEART! ❤︎

Localisation: English, French (Français), German (Deutsch), Spanish (Español)

Date format:
dd Month (all languages)
dd. Month (German language)

Time format:
HH:mm (24h)
hh:mm (12h)

By design, automatically displays in all languages that are officially supported by Pebble watch. (Currently: English, French (Français), German (Deutsch), Spanish (Español))  If, in the future, a new official language is added to Pebble watch, it will display correctly in the new language (given the new language is set by the user in the Pebble app (Android or iOS)).

latest_release.release_notes:
Implementation:
- Localisation re-enabled
